text: Peter E. Toschek (18 April 1933 - 25 June 2020) was a German experimental physicist. He researched nuclear physics, quantum optics, and laser physics. He was known as an important scientist of laser spectroscopy. He was a professor at Hamburg University. Toschek was born in Hindenburg, Saxony- Anhalt. Toschek died on 25 June 2020 in Hindenburg, aged 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German educators Category:German physicists
title: Peter E. Toschek
